Job Title: MSL - Pharma - 12 months contract - Dutch Speaker
Job Description:
About Our Client
International pharma organization focusing on the oncology market.
Job Description
 Develop and lead Key External Experts and investigators engagement plans - identify, develop and maintain long-term collaborative relationship with External Experts and Scientific Bodies.  Discuss scientific data on products with all relevant stakeholders (e.g. haematologists, oncologists, pharmacists, nurses etc).  Closely cooperate and align with key account management-team for all activities related to medical information for external groups.  Act as point of contact for unsolicited information requests on company inline and pipeline products.  Facilitate company sponsored and investigator initiated trials. Provide frequent updates on investigative site support by updating medical/clinical teams with feedback and insights from interactions and discussions with external experts and investigators.  Provide medical/scientific leadership and expertise to internal and external groups. Conduct internal trainings on medically relevant topics.  Identify and nominate members of the scientific Bureau and ensure they are updated on new clinical data and findings.  Lead and/or support advisory board meetings, round table meetings and investigator meetings.  Adhere to corporate SOPs and ensure vigilant compliance with relevant legal and regulatory requirements and guidelines governing scientific interactions with physicians and healthcare professionals across all activities.

Growing pharma organization
Share your medical knowledge to improve patient lives
The Successful Applicant
Dutch & English speaker required
Master degree in Healthcare Life Sciences, PhD is an asset
Experienced as a former MSL or medical field representative
Specialised in oncology, haematology
What's on Offer
12 months contract
Competitive salary
